alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 02 at 9:05PM PST until January 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 35 to 45 mph, with gusts 55 to 65 mph. Gusts up to 75 mph expected along the exposed locations, such as headlands and open beaches. Winds will gradually ease on the north coast between 11 pm and 1 am, and on the central coast after 2 am. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast and North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles..
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
